trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 데이터를 제공는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended"> </xref> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] A workflow instance may be suspended in one of three ways: the host may call <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> activity may be invoked from inside the workflow instance, or the workflow runtime engine may suspend the workflow instance.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]세 가지 방법 중 하나에 워크플로 인스턴스가 중단: 호스트 되어 있는 경우도 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity>활동이 워크플로 인스턴스 내부에서 호출 또는 워크플로 런타임 엔진이 워크플로 인스턴스를 일시 중단 될 수 있습니다.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When the workflow instance is suspended, the workflow runtime engine raises the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 런타임 엔진에서 발생 워크플로 인스턴스가 중단 되 고 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName>이벤트.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The host may subscribe to this event by adding an event handler to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 호스트와 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName>사이로</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime.WorkflowSuspended?displayProperty=fullName> 이벤트 처리기를 추가 하 여이 이벤트를 구독할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of why the workflow instance was suspended.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스가 일시 중단 된 이유에 대 한 설명을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: If the host suspends the workflow instance, it supplies a reason for the suspension in the `string` parameter to <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 변수에 일시 중단에 대 한 이유를 제공 호스트에서 워크플로 인스턴스를 일시 중단 하는 경우는 `string` <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.Suspend%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 매개 변수

trans-unit.source: If the workflow is suspended by a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> activity, the reason is supplied by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity>작업을 하는 이유는 <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity.Error%2A?displayProperty=fullName> 가 제공</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.SuspendActivity> 하 여 사용 하는 워크플로가 일시 중단 하는 경우

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the workflow runtime engine supplies a reason for the suspension.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않으면 워크플로 런타임 엔진에서 일시 중단에 대 한 이유를 제공 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The description of why the workflow instance was suspended.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스가 일시 중단 된 이유에 설명입니다.
